item.title: Thomson Reuters Joins R3 Blockchain Consortium - CoinDesk
item.description:
Thomson Reuters Joins R3 Blockchain Consortium - CoinDesk

Mass media company Thomson Reuters has become the latest member of the R3 blockchain consortium. The firm announced today that it had joined the effort, which has seen dozens of banks and finance firms collaborate to explore the technology. Recent members include Absa Bank, one of South Africa's largest banks, and Toyota Financial Services, the financial arm ...

item.title: R3 Blockchain Consortium Adds Thomson Reuters
item.description:
R3 Blockchain Consortium Adds Thomson Reuters

Thomson Reuters, the parent company of prominent international news agency Reuters is the newest member joining the R3 blockchain consortium. The private blockchain consortium led by New York-based R3 will now include mass media company Thomson Reuters.

item.title: Digital Asset Holdings Bulks Up with Eight New Hires - CoinDesk
item.description:
Digital Asset Holdings Bulks Up with Eight New Hires - CoinDesk

Distributed ledger technology firm Digital Asset Holdings (DAH) has hired eight new employees. At the top of the list is the firm's addition of Carol Mathis as its new CFO. Mathis joins the company from RBS Corporate and Institutional Bank, where she worked from three years as chief operating officer.

item.title: A Victory for Bitcoin Users
item.description:
A Victory for Bitcoin Users

On July 25, Miami-Dade Florida circuit judge Teresa Pooler dismissed money-laundering charges against Michell Espinoza, a local bitcoin seller. The decision is a welcome pause on the road to financial serfdom.

item.title: Welcome to United Pharmacies
item.description:
Welcome to United Pharmacies

United Pharmacies provides a wide range of brand name and generic medications at prices far cheaper your local pharmacy!

item.title: Ethereum-based Golem Network Ditches DAO Crowdsale Idea
item.description:
Ethereum-based Golem Network Ditches DAO Crowdsale Idea

Some of our readers may recall the Golem network, which runs on the Ethereum blockchain. The project creators originally wanted to build a DAO to raise enough funding for this concept. But the recent The DAO attacks have forced their hands in resorting to a traditional token sale.

item.title: Bitcoin's panopticon problem
item.description:
Bitcoin's panopticon problem

How much personal data is bitcoin really sucking out of the system courtesy of third party operators who have grown accustomed to datamining the blockchain and then cross-linking the information to their known customer lists?

item.title: Bitcoin Hard Fork Proposal Gains Traction In BTCFork Subreddit
item.description:
Bitcoin Hard Fork Proposal Gains Traction In BTCFork Subreddit

The lingering Bitcoin blocks size debacle is once again causing significant controversy among Bitcoin enthusiasts. A new subreddit has been created, which goes by the name of BTCFork. As the name suggests, this initiative was created by people who see no other solution for Bitcoin than to hard fork shortly.

item.title: Brave Browser Forges New Bitcoin Micropayment Agreement with Coinbase and BitGo
item.description:
Brave Browser Forges New Bitcoin Micropayment Agreement with Coinbase and BitGo

Brave has announced that they are partnering with Coinbase and BitGo to provide Bitcoin wallets and purchasing tools for the Brave Ledger, a new Bitcoin-based micropayments system which automatically and anonymously pays user's favorite websites. Brave will also allow users and publishers to opt into a better, privacy-preserving ad model which shares revenue with users as well as publishers.

item.title: Bitcoin Price Watch; Another 600 Test? - NEWSBTC
item.description:
Bitcoin Price Watch; Another 600 Test? - NEWSBTC

Here's a look at what we are focusing on in the bitcoin price this evening. The bitcoin price has had a pretty rough start to the month. Overnight last night, and during yesterday's session, price declined to break the 600 support level - a level that has held firm since mid June.
